Props.S: Crypto Malware Alert!_x000D__x000A_The crypto type malware has been detected. The "Server" service has been stopped and disabled to prevent further access to the file shares._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_After the infection is cleaned you must:_x000D__x000A_- Start the "Server" service (and any dependent services) to enable file share access_x000D__x000A_- Restart the "File Server Resource Manager" service to re-arm the monitoring._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_User _x000D__x000A_[Source Io Owner]_x000D__x000A_attempted to save _x000D__x000A_[Source File Path] _x000D__x000A_to_x000D__x000A_[File Screen Path]_x000D__x000A_on the_x000D__x000A_[Server] server. _x000D__x000A_This file is in the [Violated File Group] file group, which is not permitted on the server._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_A report with more information has been saved to:_x000D__x000A_"C:\StorageReports\Incident"
